detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist and soft terry inside.
V-neck jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and hole-patterned trims around the neckline and down the front and back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Ribbed wool jumper in a straight style with long raglan sleeves.
Platform Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 3 cm, heel 5 cm.

Ankle-length dress in a soft weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and pleats at the front for extra width. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a low-cut back and high-cut legs. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless body in lace and mesh with a V-neck front and back, padded cups with removable inserts, and elastication under the bust. Lined gusset with press-studs.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
A-line skirt in a cotton weave with a concealed zip in one side and a detachable, matching belt with a metal buckle.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with cap sleeves and a lace-trimmed hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Suede boots with a soft shaft, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin and leather linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
One-shoulder top in organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar with a chin guard and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fake pockets at the top, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and a small single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey. Narrow cut with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Round metal earrings with a suspended hoop decorated with sparkly stones. Length 7.5 cm. Diameter 4 cm.
Sandals with square toes, narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and gathered side seams for a more comfortable fit.

A-line blouse in a viscose weave. Double layer at the top with a lace yoke and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Patterned blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, wide raglan sleeves with a flounce and a flounced seam at the hem.
Fitted, sleeveless jumpsuit in stretch jersey with wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross over at the back and a contrasting colour panel down the sides.
Sleeveless body in stretch jersey containing glittery threads. Stand-up collar, a small opening with concealed buttons at the back of the neck, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Tights in an airy jacquard weave. 40 denier.
Shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress woven in a linen blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck. Buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and side pockets. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying jersey with a V-neck and a tie detail at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini with a print motif. Triangle top with a gathered seam at the front and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with a sewn-on bow tie and printed waistcoat at the front, a round neck and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped chest pocket, diagonal front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Backpack in shimmering, holographic imitation leather with a zip and handle at the top and padded, adjustable shoulder straps. Zipped outer compartment with a faux fur pompom and glittery appliqués. Lined. Size 13x22x28 cm.
Boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 8 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a partially reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Deep neckline with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Dungarees in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with front and back pockets and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Lightweight, unlined liner socks in fast-drying functional fabric with reinforcement at the toes and heels.
Thin metal chain necklace with a decorative metal ring. Adjustable length, approx. 52-59 cm.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in a quilted weave. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip with a chin guard at the front and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a double-layered hood with a wrapover front.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, slightly shorter legs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Pleated, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with matching accessories.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Short skirt in imitation leather with quilted sections, a diagonal zip at the front and tabs with metal buckles at the top. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
Cropped vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
